Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Austin. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Austin.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Correction: Brown Line Service Delayed at Merchandise Mart
ShortDescription: Correction: Brown Line trains are standing at Merchandise Mart due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Correction: Brown Line trains are standing at Merchandise Mart due to a sick customer.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
